title: Ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a single CLI or REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API (Node & browsers).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio bindings for Ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLM or Embeddings endpoints.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model; runs locally.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with POJO model mapping.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with Ollama.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with history, syntax highlighting, and themes.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot pane.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama server and models on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: function-calling, RAG, fine-tune, multimodal, etc.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri-based desktop app for macOS/Windows/Linux.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to query Ollama models inside the editor with completion.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to spin up Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Ready-to-run Retrieval-Augmented-Generation stack using Ollama + Chroma.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to summarize notes, brainstorm, or translate with Ollama.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot starter auto-configuring Ollama REST client beans.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot bringing local LLM chats to your server.

title: ollama-dotnet
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed request/response models.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Community-curated list of custom Modelfiles and quantized GGUFs ready for Ollama.
